name: Burnt ToaSt
description:
A short romance VN about Christmas preparations.

ACM Studio Snowjam 2021 Submission! Theme = Toasty. Made in 48 hours (with an additional 48 hours of bugfixes post-jam). The project was designed from scratch in Unity 2021.3.24f1.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

The minigame can be quite unintuitive; if you ever get stuck, feel free to turn on "Enable Dev Scene Skip" in the options menu and press 'q' to skip the scene.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Known Bugs:

- Some dialogue is cut off due to the text box size. Clicking a lot during dialogue scenes may crash the game. A handful of grammar/spelling  mistakes.

- The cooking minigame can end early if multiple items are stacked and combined at once.

- ham duplication.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Version History:

v1.0 (2021-12-17) - Released broken version for jam. Completely broken.

v1.1 (2021-12-17) - Added scenes 2-5. Added Instant-text toggle button. Fixed minigame. Fixed settings button advancing dialogue. Music fixed. Cooking minigame greatly improved. Toggleable scene skip (hidden hotkey).

v 1.2 (2021-12-18) - Enabled clicking to skip dialogue text rendering. Fixed crash when rapid-clicking Play button. Text speed slider. Major dialogue fixes. Minigame fix.

v 1.3 (2021-12-19) - Code cleanup. Minigames 3-4 complete. Dialogue temporarily fixed. Playable on the web.

v 1.4 (2021-12-19) - Character Expressions added. Some typos fixed. SFX added.
